OOC:can you leave you out ofd character BS to private emails



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> Jesus Christ!!!!  This sounds soooooooo cooooooooool!!!!!!  That is 
a link between RPGs!!!!!!!  Wicked, I'm in!!!
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: David Torrey 
>   To: nbmrpg@egroups.com ; nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 4:18 AM
>   Subject: The first message for Neo Beast Machines!!
> 
> 
>   ::Unicron::
> 
>       "Here we are, at the beginning of a new saga. The
Transformers 
are in for much more than they have seen. I will be returning, at
some 
point, once I have enough power. But until then I will use some of my 
power to alter the planet. Then Magmatron will own some of the
planet, 
the parts I need."
>       Cybertron glowed a bright crimson red. The Citadel of Elders 
now becomes Magmatrons layer. Some new characters will be appearing 
under Magmatron's rule.
>       Unicron traveled back in time. He reached Past Earth. He was 
in the Neo Beast Wars near future. He placed a Time Gate on the
planet 
in a remote location. He then traveled a few days back.
>       He found Magmatron trying to move his base closer to the 
ocean.
>       "That's right, he needs salt water to survive. Well, that's
no 
problem," He said to himself. He talked to Magmatron.
>       "My minion, the time has come for you to leave this planet 
behind, you have greater goals. I will allow you time to decide who 
will lead the Destron forces in your place."
>       "It is decided, master," Magmatron called up. "Shredder will 
lead the Destrons here on Earth."
>       "Very well, I will transport you to Cybertron."
>       With that Magmatron was gone from Past Earth. The Gateway 
would be discovered in a few days and more Transformers may travel 
through it. (Leaving it as a story connector)
> 
> 
----------------------------------------------------------------------
--------
> 
> 
> 
>
